languages.text: {n}У каждой из них ее лицо, но спутать их невозможно. Черты одной застыли в гримасе ненависти, словно маска. Она надрывно хрипит:{/n} "Ты создана, чтобы быть инструментом. Ты не умеешь противиться руке, повелевающей тобой. Потому рано или поздно ты сдашься".

{n}Both figures have her face, and yet there is no mistaking one for the other. One of them is twisted into a still, mask-like grimace of loathing. It rasps as if ripping its own throat apart,{/n} "You were created to serve as a tool. You do not have the capacity to oppose the hand that commands you. That is why, sooner or later, you will succumb."

languages.text: {n}Aunque ambas figuras poseen el mismo rostro, es imposible no distinguirlas. Uno de ellos presenta una mueca de odio retorcido y es similar a una máscara. Ruge como si se desgarrase la garganta:{/n} «Se la creó para servir como herramienta. No posee la capacidad de oponerse a la mano que le da de comer. Por eso, tarde o temprano, sucumbirá».
languages.original_text: {n}Both figures have her face, and yet there is no mistaking one for the other. One of them is twisted into a still, mask-like grimace of loathing. It rasps as if ripping its own throat apart,{/n} "You were created to serve as a tool. You do not have the capacity to oppose the hand that commands you. That is why, sooner or later, you will succumb."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque ambas figuras poseen el mismo rostro, es imposible no distinguirlas. Uno de ellos presenta una mueca de odio retorcido y es similar a una máscara. Ruge como si se desgarrase la garganta:{/n} «Se la creó para servir como herramienta. No posee la capacidad de oponerse a la mano que le da de comer. Por eso, tarde o temprano, sucumbirá».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: {n}どちらも顔は彼女だけど、どちらがどちらか見間違うことはない。そのうち1人は顔をピクリとも動かさず、嫌悪感を漂わせ仮面のように貼り付けた険しい表情をしている。自分の喉を切り裂きそうなほどだ。{/n}「あなたは道具として作られた。命令する者に逆らう力はない。だから遅かれ早かれ屈服するのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Both figures have her face, and yet there is no mistaking one for the other. One of them is twisted into a still, mask-like grimace of loathing. It rasps as if ripping its own throat apart,{/n} "You were created to serve as a tool. You do not have the capacity to oppose the hand that commands you. That is why, sooner or later, you will succumb."

traits.locale_text: {n}どちらも顔は彼女だけど、どちらがどちらか見間違うことはない。そのうち1人は顔をピクリとも動かさず、嫌悪感を漂わせ仮面のように貼り付けた険しい表情をしている。自分の喉を切り裂きそうなほどだ。{/n}「あなたは道具として作られた。命令する者に逆らう力はない。だから遅かれ早かれ屈服するのよ」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: {n}两个人都长着同样的脸，但表情却截然不同。其中一个人的脸扭曲着，满是厌恶之意，看起来仿佛面具一般。面具发出了刺耳的声音，似乎想要将自己的喉咙撕开。{/n}“你存在的意义就是成为工具，你没有能力反抗主人的意愿，你迟早都会听命于他。”
languages.original_text: {n}Both figures have her face, and yet there is no mistaking one for the other. One of them is twisted into a still, mask-like grimace of loathing. It rasps as if ripping its own throat apart,{/n} "You were created to serve as a tool. You do not have the capacity to oppose the hand that commands you. That is why, sooner or later, you will succumb."

traits.locale_text: {n}两个人都长着同样的脸，但表情却截然不同。其中一个人的脸扭曲着，满是厌恶之意，看起来仿佛面具一般。面具发出了刺耳的声音，似乎想要将自己的喉咙撕开。{/n}“你存在的意义就是成为工具，你没有能力反抗主人的意愿，你迟早都会听命于他。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: {n}Beide Gestalten haben ihr Gesicht, und doch sehen sie sich nicht ähnlich. Eine der beiden verzieht das Gesicht zu einer maskenhaften Grimasse. Sie röchelt, als würde sie sich selbst die Kehle aufschlitzen.{/n} "Ihr wurdet geschaffen, um als Werkzeug zu dienen. Ihr könnt Euch der Hand nicht verwehren, die Euch befehligt. Deshalb werdet Ihr Euch früher oder später unterwerfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Both figures have her face, and yet there is no mistaking one for the other. One of them is twisted into a still, mask-like grimace of loathing. It rasps as if ripping its own throat apart,{/n} "You were created to serve as a tool. You do not have the capacity to oppose the hand that commands you. That is why, sooner or later, you will succumb."

traits.locale_text: {n}Beide Gestalten haben ihr Gesicht, und doch sehen sie sich nicht ähnlich. Eine der beiden verzieht das Gesicht zu einer maskenhaften Grimasse. Sie röchelt, als würde sie sich selbst die Kehle aufschlitzen.{/n} "Ihr wurdet geschaffen, um als Werkzeug zu dienen. Ihr könnt Euch der Hand nicht verwehren, die Euch befehligt. Deshalb werdet Ihr Euch früher oder später unterwerfen."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: {n}Si les deux silhouettes ont son visage, il est impossible de les confondre. L'une d'elles a les traits déformés par une grimace haineuse, figée comme un masque. Elle s'exprime d'une voix rauque à s'en déchirer le gosier :{/n} « Tu as été créée pour servir d'instrument. Tu n'as pas la capacité de t'opposer à la main qui tire les ficelles. C'est la raison pour laquelle tu es condamnée à succomber tôt ou tard. »
languages.original_text: {n}Both figures have her face, and yet there is no mistaking one for the other. One of them is twisted into a still, mask-like grimace of loathing. It rasps as if ripping its own throat apart,{/n} "You were created to serve as a tool. You do not have the capacity to oppose the hand that commands you. That is why, sooner or later, you will succumb."

C'est la raison pour laquelle tu es condamnée à succomber tôt ou tard. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Cruelty

languages.text: {n}İki surette de onun yüzü var ancak yine de birbirleriyle karıştırılmaları imkânsız. Birisinin yüzü tiksinti dolu, sabit, maskemsi bir buruşukluğa sahip. Kendi boğazını yırtıyormuş gibi hırıltılı bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bir gereç olarak hizmet etmek için yaratıldın. Sana hükmeden ele karşı durma kapasitesine sahip değilsin. Bu yüzden de er ya da geç boyun eğeceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}Both figures have her face, and yet there is no mistaking one for the other. One of them is twisted into a still, mask-like grimace of loathing. It rasps as if ripping its own throat apart,{/n} "You were created to serve as a tool. You do not have the capacity to oppose the hand that commands you. That is why, sooner or later, you will succumb."
